formatted_address: S-40-02 Pusat Komersil Visi Medini, 2, Persiaran Medini, Bandar Medini Iskandar, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Ikigai Music Sanctuary

reviews.text: Mr Wilson has personally taught me so much over the past year and a half in preparation for my grade 6 exam. He has made learning music fun and exciting again for me, contrary to my former piano teacher. I believe that a teacher that is able to teach this well nowadays is extremely rare, so if anyone is looking for a place for kids to learn  music, I very highly recommend Ikigai.

Wilson is an amazing teacher who worked with my 15 year old son on Piano.
He helped my son produce and write his own original music piece, while also helping him in his music theory. Ikigai Music Sanctuary is a beautiful space to learn music in!
Good place to learn music...Mr. Wilson is an excellent music Guide.

vicinity: S-40-02 Pusat Komersil Visi Medini, 2, Persiaran Medini, Bandar Medini Iskandar, Iskandar Puteri
